title: Crunchy Peanut Butter Cereal Bars Recipe
full_text:
Crunchy Peanut Butter Cereal Bars Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
10 mins
Active
15 mins
Cooling Time
15 mins
Total
30 mins
Serves
16 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
4
tablespoons
(
2
ounces
)
unsalted butter
1
(
10-ounce) bag
marshmallows
(
47
large
)
Pinch
salt
5
tablespoons
creamy peanut butter
5 1/2
cups
Cap 'N Crunch's Peanut Butter Crunch Cereal
1
cup
honey roasted peanuts
Directions
Grease a 9- by 9-inch pan. Heat butter in large saucepan (preferably non-stick) over medium-low heat until almost melted. Add marshmallows and salt and heat, stirring, until marshmallows have melted.
Remove from heat and stir in peanut butter until combined. Stir in cereal and peanuts until combined. Immediately spread into pan and press to smooth top. Let cool until set, about 15 minutes.
Special equipment
9- by 9-inch pan
Dessert Bars
Baking
Peanut Butter
